events.message: I ordered my package over two weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking information hasn't been updated in over a week, which is very frustrating.
System has categorized the customer's concern as a delivery delay based on keywords like 'not arrived' and 'tracking hasn't been updated'.
The case has been assigned to delivery support team representative John for further assistance and follow-up.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand how important it is to get your order on time. Let me check the status for you.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address to help me look into the delay more accurately?
Sure, the order number is #4589213 and the shipping address is 123 Maple Street, Springfield, IL 62704.

I have contacted the shipping carrier; it appears your package was delayed due to weather conditions. We expect delivery within 3-5 business days. I can also offer you a shipping discount on your next order.
Thanks for the update and the discount offer. I appreciate you keeping me informed about the situation.
We will keep monitoring the shipment, but your issue is now considered resolved. Please let us know if you encounter any further problems.
Just checking in to confirm that your package was delivered successfully and that you are satisfied with our support.
As we have received no further concerns, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting our support team!
